He was born in Dallas, Texas. After being diagnosed with HIV in 1985, he created the group as part of his efforts to find and sell drugs to treat HIV at a time when the disease was poorly understood.Ron Woodroof The Biography.com website. Retrieved 2014-07-09 He sued the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) over a ban on peptide T, a drug he was using. Woodroof's final years became the plot of the 2013 movie Dallas Buyers Club where Matthew McConaughey played Woodroof. Woodroof died on September 12, 1992 from pneumonia brought on by AIDS in Dallas at the age of 42. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in Texas Category:Deaths from AIDS Category:American health activists Category:Businesspeople from Dallas
